Further, SafeGold has appointed an independent trustee who has the authority to act on your behalf and to protect your interests. The trustee also verifies the quantity and purity of gold. Vistra Corporate Services has been appointed as Security Trustee by SafeGold. Vistra has the first and exclusive charge over your gold held in vaults which means it has a charge over the gold over other commercial creditors till the time of fulfillment of delivery to you.
